casebody.data:
PENN YAN BOATS, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SEA LARK BOATS, INC., et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 72-3027. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 30, 1973. Rehearing Denied May 31, 1973.

Before WISDOM, GEWIN and COLEMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1 We adopt the opinion of the district court as the opinion of this Court. 359 F.Supp. 948.

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
